reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent two nights at Sails Motel and found it to be a clean, well located and quiet little motel. Deb and Ted are friendly hosts. They gave us a warm welcome and were quick to give advise about places to eat, etc. The room was compact but included everything we needed. No flashy extras but very reasonably priced.
reviews.title: Clean and well located

likes.liked: — Did I mention it was clean?!
likes.disliked: — Noisy neighbours... luckily they were friends attending the same wedding!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was a lovely motel, well tucked back from the road so nice and quiet but still almost on the beach front and a couple of doors down from the dolphin/albatross encounter building. We had one of the studio units and found it very good value for money. The owners were really helpful and provided a lift to and from the train station for us.
reviews.title: Lovely motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found Kaikoura quite expensive to eat out except for the seafood barbecue towards the seal colony which the owners recommended to us. The food here was lovely and excellent value.
reviews.title: Beautiful place and room
